column4: Hi, I have a trouble with Gutsy, I have extreme slowdowns (enough so that it's hard to move the mouse), but if I reboot, then everything is fine. Anyone might know what I need to check first? I have a decent comp (Athlon XP 2200, 1gb ram, etc)
bring up a terminal and run the dmesg command
brb, I'll switch irc to that comp
